mapper.sql: id, entity_name, business, datasource_id, main_table, entity_field, non_main_table,main_entity_field_name
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from ds_entity_info
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into ds_entity_info (id, entity_name, business, datasource_id, main_table, entity_field, non_main_table,main_entity_field_name,non_main_table_name) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{entity_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{business,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{data_source_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{main_table_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{main_entity_field_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{non_main_table_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{main_entity_field_name_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{non_main_table_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into iq_domain_info ( business_type_id, business_type_name, domain_id, domain_name, table_id, table_name, is_main, name_field) values (#{businessTypeId}, #{businessTypeName}, #{domainId}, #{domainName}, #{tableId}, #{tableName}, #{isMain}, #{nameField})

insert into ds_entity_info
id,
entity_name,
business,
datasource_id,
main_table,
entity_field,
non_main_table,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{entityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{business,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{datasourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{mainTable,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{entityField,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{nonMainTable,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update ds_entity_info
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
entity_name = #{record.entityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
business = #{record.business,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
datasource_id = #{record.datasourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
main_table = #{record.mainTable,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
entity_field = #{record.entityField,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
non_main_table = #{record.nonMainTable,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update ds_entity_info set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, entity_name = #{record.entityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, business = #{record.business,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, datasource_id = #{record.datasourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, main_table = #{record.mainTable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, entity_field = #{record.entityField,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, non_main_table = #{record.nonMainTable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ds_entity_info
entity_name = #{entity_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
business = #{business,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
datasource_id = #{data_source_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
main_table = #{main_table_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
entity_field = #{main_entity_field_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
non_main_table = #{non_main_table_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
main_entity_field_name = #{main_entity_field_name_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
non_main_table_name = #{non_main_table_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{entity_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update ds_entity_info set entity_name = #{entityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, business = #{business,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, datasource_id = #{datasourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, main_table = #{mainTable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, entity_field = #{entityField,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, non_main_table = #{nonMainTable,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
